itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Fit Body Bootcamp founder and massively successful entrepreneur and business coach Bedros Keuilian to talk about growing up under Communism, his rags to riches story that started with him eating out of dumpsters, and what he believes are the best ways to get ahead in business and life.

 

Go to ghostbed.com/drinkinbros and use code DRINKINBROS for 30% off EVERYTHING (Mattresses, Adjustable Base, and more) -- plus a 101 Night Sleep Trial and Mattresses Made in the USA!

 

Go to CardoMAX.com and use promo code DB, and you get Buy One Get One FREE on your first order.

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/drinkinbros14 and use code DRINKINBROS14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping!
